Table of contents » Commands for setting up measurements/Observables

Radius of gyration

Available options

  • of_chain of_chain 2
    Limits the calculation to the third chain in the population. If radius of gyration measurements are not limited to a single chain in this manner, it is calculated over the entire system.
See also:
